set.name: Danny Mahoney
set.article: Danny Mahoney is the owner/operator of Life of the Party, Inc., launched following a failed suicide attempt by Mr. Mahoney -- itself the result of a failed plumbing business.

set.name: Unnamed Plumbing Company
set.article: Until late 2008, Danny and Bert Mahoney operated a as-yet unnamed plumbing business. In the winter of that year, Bertrand 'grew weary' of Danny's personality and executed a hostile takeover, plunging Danny into a short-lived emotional spiral that led to a failed suicide attempt.

set.name: Danny Mahoney Wears a Heavy Coat Into the Ocean
set.nb_timestamp: timestamp is approximate - winter prior to CBB #14

set.name: Danny Mahoney Buys Nordstrom's Heaviest Coat
set.nb_timestamp: timestamp is approximate - winter prior to CBB #14

set.name: Life of the Party, Inc.
set.article: Life of the Party, Inc., is a party-execution operation launched and owned by Danny Mahoney. The way it works is: if you're throwing a party -- any kind of a party, doesn't matter if it's a Baz Mitzvah, somebody's getting out of jail, or even a gay wedding -- you hire LOTPCInc and Danny will come to the party and make it fantastic by being the life of the party.
